chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
x: seq R

Goal:
0 <= seq_step x

Premises:
Notation seq := list
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
RRle_abs : forall x : R, x <= Rabs x
interval_finite_subdiv : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal), a <= b -> {l : seq R | head 0 l = a /\ last 0 l = b /\ (forall i : nat, (S i < size l)%nat -> nth 0 l i < nth 0 l (S i) <= nth 0 l i + eps)}
Rabs_pos_lt : forall x : R, x <> 0 -> 0 < Rabs x
antiderivative = fun (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) => (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> exists pr : derivable_pt g x, f x = derive_pt g x pr) /\ a <= b : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Rmult_le_compat_l : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 <= r -> r1 <= r2 -> r * r1 <= r * r2
Rminus_le_0 : forall a b : R, a <= b < -> 0 <= b - a
pow_lt : forall (x : R) (n : nat), 0 < x -> 0 < x ^ n
Zeq_bool_complete : forall x y : Z, gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp x = gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp y -> Zeq_bool x y = true
Rmult_le_reg_l : forall r r1 r2 : R, 0 < r -> r * r1 <= r * r2 -> r1 <= r2
is_upper_bound = fun (E : R -> Prop) (m : R) => forall x : R, E x -> x <= m : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
derive_pt_const : forall a x : R, derive_pt (fct_cte a) x (derivable_pt_const a x) = 0
tech1 : forall (An : nat -> R) (N : nat), (forall n : nat, (n <= N)%nat -> 0 < An n) -> 0 < sum_f_R0 An N
sorted_incr : forall (s : seq R) (i j : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i <= j)%nat -> (j < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= nth x0 s j
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
tech6 : forall (An : nat -> R) (k : R) (N : nat), 0 <= k -> (forall i : nat, An (S i) < k * An i) -> sum_f_R0 An N <= An 0%nat * sum_f_R0 (fun i : nat => k ^ i) N
RealField.RField_lemma5 : forall (l : seq R) (l1 : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)), (forall lock : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z) -> Prop, lock = PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq (gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp) N.to_nat pow l -> lock (Fapp (Fcons2 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem) l1 [::])) -> PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq (gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp) N.to_nat pow l l1
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope _]
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments T1, T2 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
Rle_trans : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 <= r2 -> r2 <= r3 -> r1 <= r3
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n <= p)%nat
RealField.RField_ring_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lH : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (l : seq R), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq (gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp) N.to_nat pow l lH ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp (gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp) N.to_nat pow l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp 0%Z 1%Z Zeq_bool (gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp) N.to_nat pow get_signZ l npe
sorted_last : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= last x0 s
sorted_head : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, head x0 s <= nth x0 s i
RField_lemma5 : forall (l : seq R) (l1 : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)), (forall lock : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z) -> Prop, lock = PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq IZR N.to_nat pow l -> lock (Fapp (Fcons2 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem) l1 [::])) -> PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq IZR N.to_nat pow l l1
last_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T) (z : T), last x (rcons s z) = z
nth_compat : forall (s : seq R) (n : nat), pos_Rl (seq2Rlist s) n = nth 0 s n
RealField.RField_field_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lpe : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (l : seq R), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq (gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp) N.to_nat pow l lpe -> forall lmp : seq (Z * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol Z), Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem lpe = lmp -> forall (fe : FExpr Z) (nfe : linear Z), Fnorm 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool fe = nfe -> PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq (gen_phiZ 0 1 Rplus Rmult Ropp) N.to_nat pow l (condition nfe) ->...
le_S_n : forall n m : nat, (S n <= S m)%nat -> (n <= m)%nat
